name: Procemon: You Must Catch Them (itch)
description:
Create Random Monsters

Procedurally generated monster collecting game. Every monster is randomly created. Every playthough is totally unique. 

Join the Discord server!

Fuse two Proćemon to make a new powerful Proćemon!

Explore the Multiverse

Use the  Procedural Generator to journey to new worlds.

Battle enemies to level up your Proćemon or charm enemies into joining your team. Every move, animation, and special effect is procedurally generated.

Earn badges by defeating the Shareholders of the evil Infinity Corporation.
